text: @DanielNewman @GovKemp @FoxNews @ChrisCuomo @AP @FOX5Atlanta @kaitlynross1 @MauraSirianni @MarkBradleyAJC @AJCGaPolitics @staceyabrams @KeishaBottoms This Governor does not care for life except for his family.  He reopens Georgia putting his Constituents in harms way but not his family.  Governor if you feel its not safe due to COVID-19  why reopen.  Economy before lives.
